title: 1.2 million Americans laid off in 2025 as job cuts hit highest level since the COVID-19 pandemic — Is AI now a major factor in U.S. job cuts?
description: US layoffs 2025: More than 1.17 million Americans lost their jobs in 2025. Cuts surged 54% from last year. November alone saw 71,321 layoffs. Telecom led with 15,139 cuts. AI drove 54,694 losses this year. Government cuts hit 307,000. Big firms like Amazon, U…
content: US layoffs 2025 are surging to levels not seen since the pandemic. From January through November, companies have cut 1,170,821 jobs, a 54% increase from the same period in 2024. November alone saw 71… [+6943 chars]
